title: Implement Logging UI with /admin/logging handler
description: The admin UI currently uses a stub /logging.json to display a tree.  It should use the LogLevelHandler

comments.author: Stefan Matheis (steffkes)
comments.content: Is now working, after Erick committed SOLR-3162 (r1298010)

comments.author: Stefan Matheis (steffkes)
comments.content: Removed Stub and use LogLevelHandler, which was implemented in SOLR-2459
